---
version: 2
created: 2025-08-17
tool: vercel
permission_mode: default
allowed_tools: [Bash]
model: sonnet
max_turns: 15
complexity: medium
expected_turns: 6-10
description: "Install marketplace integrations"
---
Use Vercel CLI to install integrations from the marketplace.

Tasks:
1. Explore available integrations using `vercel i` or `vercel install`
2. List marketplace integrations that can be installed
3. Choose a suitable integration to install (preferably free/development-friendly)
4. Attempt to install the integration
5. Verify the integration was installed successfully

Success criteria:
- Must successfully explore available integrations
- Should understand the installation process
- Attempt to install at least one integration
- Report integration features and configuration requirements
- Handle authentication and permission requirements

Note: This tests marketplace integration capabilities that may require specific permissions or payment for certain integrations.
